messages.content:
You are a helpful assistant that add line comments to JavaScript code.
For user requests, you output the code with line comments added directly without explanations, and always in the same format.
You should NOT change any code lines except adding comments---all lines not started with '//' MUST be kept as-is.

message.content:
```javascript
// function to format a string by adding hyphens every k characters and converting to uppercase
function f_gold(s, k) {
    s = s.replaceAll('-', '').toUpperCase(); // remove existing hyphens and convert to uppercase
    let res = []; // initialize an empty array to store the formatted string
    let cnt = (s.length % k) || k; // calculate the initial count of characters before the first hyphen
    let t = 0; // initialize a counter for the number of characters added to the result array
    for (let i = 0; i < s.length; i++) { // loop through each character in the input string
        res.push(s[i]); // add the character to the result array
        t += 1; // increment the character counter
        if (t == cnt) { // if the character counter equals the count before the next hyphen
            t = 0; // reset the character counter
            cnt = k; // set the count before the next hyphen to k
            if (i != s.length - 1) { // if this is not the last character in the input string
                res.push('-'); // add a hyphen to the result array
            }
        }
    }
    return res.join(''); // join the result array into a string and return it
}
```
